name: KNS Technologies
description:
KNS Technologies is an integrated technology solutions provider that offers end to end services to customers that enable them to effectively deploy IT for distinct competitive advantage and business success. Incorporated in 2009, the Company has since delivered high value solutions to top notch clients in all key industry verticals. We understand midsize businesses quite well and focus on solutions that help them meet their business goals, rather than offer technology for technologyâ€™s sake.
Our products and solutions in Enterprise mobility, ERP customization, Cloud based CRM and web applications are tailored to offer value through alignment with their distinct operations structure and business drivers. With operations in the US and India, KNS Tech is well positioned to offer high quality service to its clients by leveraging, both, our local presence and capability to offer solutions at best costs.
